results.name: Multi-VM Blueprint Example 2
results.description: Multi-VM Blueprint for Tomcat and MySQL
results.yml:
MySQL: 
  group: db
  region: HG-GS1603-0153
  image: C:\ClusterStorage\HyperCloud_Templates\Default_Update\Ubuntu14HFTemplate.vhdx
  instanceType: cpu=2,memory=8GB,disk=40GB,generation=1
  network: Compute vmSwitch,vlanId=16
  skipAgentInstall: false
  username: hf
  password: HyperGrid123
  count: 1
  plugins:
    - !plugin
      id: eObh2
      lifecycle: post_create
      arguments:
        - MYSQL_DATABASE=names
        - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password
Tomcat: 
  group: app
  region: HG-GS1603-0153
  image: C:\ClusterStorage\HyperCloud_Templates\Default_Update\Ubuntu14HFTemplate.vhdx
  instanceType: cpu=2,memory=8GB,disk=40GB,generation=1
  network: Compute vmSwitch,vlanId=16
  skipAgentInstall: false
  username: hf
  password: HyperGrid123
  count: 1
  dependsOn: MySQL
  plugins:
    - !plugin
      id: Iz1rQ
      lifecycle: post_create
      arguments:
        - war_source=https://github.com/hypergrid-inc/basic-docker-tomcat-example/raw/master/software/sample.war
        - database_driverClassName=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
        - database_url=jdbc:mysql://{{MySQL|ip}}:3306/names
        - database_username=root
        - database_password=password
  #hbsVolumes: 
  #  - !volume 
  #    volume_provider_id: 2c9180865c66c328015c66c7c8190003
  #    size: 5G
  #    prefix: db
  #    name: database
